messages.subject: Question games
messages.msgSnippet: ... Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead has THE COOLEST question game scenes. FINALLY on a real, legitimate North-American DVD!! Gary Oldman, Tim Roth,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/10/05 8:39:25 AM, ecsamhill@... writes:


> At my house just this week we've started doing improv games borrowed
> from Whose Line Is It Any Way.Â  One game that we do is a conversation
> with only questions.
>

Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead has THE COOLEST question game scenes.


FINALLY on a real, legitimate North-American DVD!!
Gary Oldman, Tim Roth, Richard Dreyfuss,

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000777I88/103-3391823-6727026?v=glance&
n=130&n=507846&s=dvd&v=glance

And you can buy the book (the play, and act it out yourself) used there for
$1.14 and shipping. (Well one of you can; the next person will have to pay
$1.15...)

Sandra
